title: Algebraic Effects
description: Define side-effects in a pure and composible way using algebraic effects

title: EnumFP
description: Functional Enum type / Sum type for javascript with simple pattern matching

title: Shotkey
description: Hotkey daemon for X11 window managers

title: PlasmaJS
description: An isomorphic NodeJS framework powered with React for building web apps. It has features like declarative syntax, isomorphic routing, isolated routing for building REST APIs, middlewares, ES2015 syntax with babel

title: Pipey
description: Create pipeline operator ready functions by converting instance methods's to context-free functions

title: Diary PWA
description: Build a progressive web app in go-lang that lets you carry a personalized secure diary in your pocket. Write down memories, keep your thoughts and ideas for the day in one place. You can also enable pattern lock for each session making your diary even more secure.

title: Pattern Lock JS
description: A customizable pattern lock JavaScript library for the web. It uses HTML5 canvas.

title: H Kotlin
description: A simple, easy to use, library for HTML templating in kotlin. It allows you to write re-usable components in Kotlin.
